body: Ok I was banned for using hacks even though I didn't but whatever  I played this server for a long time since mc zone (different account) probably no one cares about this thread and probably no one knows me but I am saying that I am back after a couple of months and I never thought I would be banned for something like that but it is over now and if anyone knows me plz thank you so much! I truly love this server!!
